title: Microsoft Access Panel extension is still not available for EDGE
body: Microsoft Access Panel extension is still not available for EDGE which stops every single AAD and Office 365 user from using https:\\myapps.microsoft.com for SSO with EDGE to cloud services. It is embarrassing to tell all my organisations O365 users to switch to using Chrome or Firefox (or IE) as Microsoft only has extensions for these and has not bothered to for EDGE.

comments.body: THe plugin and Azure AD Access Panel Extensions is limited in control.
